replies.msg:
With once the largest mass transit system in HK, the MTR corp, stops to serve its citizens tonight starting 8pm, now I call for citizens across Hong Kong to enforce the Citizens’ Curfew.

Even without government announcement, HKSAR Government as largest shareholder of the MTR Corp is actually using her influence to the company to hinder usual night time activities of the citizens. The Government is indirectly enforcing a curfew.

We, as citizens, are forced to compliant with such judgement of the Government, which might result in a standstill of local economy.

All citizens, may I have your cooperation to show the world Hong Kong is now a ghost city.

The government simply closing everything, just to intentionally create chaos around the city.  Trying to blame protesters causing that.  Obvious move..but sorry not working.  We ALL know who to blame! Fuck you Carrie Lam!
